description:
Today`s theme is "cognitive impairment." If young people show symptoms, there may be depression, schizophrenia, or some other condition below the surface...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cognitive Impairment... Is Your Intelligence Okay?
La démence... Comment vont vos capacités intellectuelles ?
Ninchishou... Anata no Chinou wa Daijoubu?
認知症...あなたの知能は大丈夫?
